author: Nintendo of America
description:
Gloomy Eyes is out now on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/gloomy-eyes-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01
 
The sun has vanished. The world lies in bitter darkness. But in the shadows… a curious girl and a gentle zombie boy are about to change everything. Witness stunningly haunting visuals in this single-player “self-coop” cozy horror adventure filled with puzzle-solving and exploring of spooky dioramas—all in the search to restore the sun. 

#GloomyEyes #NintendoSwitch
  

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: Gloomy Eyes – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Little Nightmares III comes to Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2 on Oct 10, 2025. Pre-order today: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/little-nightmares-iii-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=A1013-01&utm_id=A1013-01

Trapped in the Spiral, a world filled with delusions, Low & Alone are looking for a way out. Through their journey, they enter the Carnevale, a decrepit, ill-fated attempt to bring fun to the funfair.

Do what you must to survive the ride, little ones.

#LittleNightmaresIII #NintendoSwitch #NintendoSwitch2


Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s
